paper_abstract: This paper is devoted to the study of self-dual codes arising from constacyclic codes. Necessary and sufficient conditions are given for the existence of Hermitian self-dual constacyclic codes over of length . As an application of these necessary and sufficient conditions, some conditions under which MDS Hermitian self-orthogonal and self-dual constacyclic codes exist are obtained.
paper_title: On self-dual constacyclic codes over finite fields
